MatchedRegions.transcript: Unlike other methods, our method employs the losses during a short fine-tuning process on models that were already pre-trained on ImageNet.

MatchedRegion.Text: Our method employs the losses during a short finetuning process on models pretrained on ImageNet.

MatchedRegions.transcript: We add a classification loss at classification to ensure that the accuracy of the models does not decrease due to the fine-tuning process.

MatchedRegion.Text: We add a classification loss (Lclassification) to ensure that the accuracy of the model does not decrease due to the finetuning process.

MatchedRegions.transcript: The formulation of our classification loss is as follows, and it encourages the model to have high confidence on its predictions.
Thus, our final loss term is formulated as follows as a combination of the relevance and the classification loss.
